alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 3:58PM CDT until June 07 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY COUNTY... At 257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles north of Whitman, or 34 miles northwest of Mullen, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 340 PM CDT quarter size hail was reported 20 miles north of Ashby. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Sevenmile Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road and Hire. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 168 and 186. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
